mapper.select:
SELECT hosR_id, hosR_idCar, hosR_medical, hosR_regPrice, hosR_phone, hosR_selfPrice, hosR_sex, hosR_age, hosR_work, hosR_lookDoctor, hosregister.d_id, hosR_remark, hosR_state,hosR_name,hosR_time,d_name,d_keshi FROM hosregister, doctor where hosregister.d_id = doctor.d_id
and hosR_id like concat('%',#{hosrId},'%')
and d_name like concat('%',#{dName},'%')
and hosR_time >= #{startTime}
and hosR_time <= #{endTime}
and d_keshi like concat('%',#{dKeshi},'%')
order by hosR_id
SELECT * FROM doctor GROUP BY d_keshi

SELECT hosR_id, hosR_idCar, hosR_medical, hosR_regPrice, hosR_phone, hosR_selfPrice, hosR_sex, hosR_age, hosR_work, hosR_lookDoctor, hosregister.d_id, hosR_remark, hosR_name,d_name,d_keshi FROM hosregister, doctor where hosregister.d_id = doctor.d_id and hosR_id = #{hosrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT hosR_id, hosR_idCar, hosR_medical, hosR_regPrice, hosR_phone, hosR_selfPrice, hosR_sex, hosR_age, hosR_work, hosR_lookDoctor, hosregister.d_id, hosR_remark, hosR_name,d_name,d_keshi FROM hosregister, doctor where hosregister.d_id = doctor.d_id and hosR_id in
#{id}
mapper.update: update hosregister set hosR_idCar = #{hosrIdcar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hosR_medical = #{hosrMedical,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hosR_regPrice = #{hosrRegprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hosR_phone = #{hosrPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hosR_selfPrice = #{hosrSelfprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hosR_sex = #{hosrSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hosR_age = #{hosrAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hosR_work = #{hosrWork,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hosR_lookDoctor = #{hosrLookdoctor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hosR_remark = #{hosrRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hosR_name = #{hosrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where hosR_id = #{hosrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE hosregister set hosR_state = 3 WHERE hosR_id=#{hosrId,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.sql: hosR_id, hosR_idCar, hosR_medical, hosR_regPrice, hosR_phone, hosR_selfPrice, hosR_sex, hosR_age, hosR_work, hosR_lookDoctor, d_id, hosR_remark, hosR_state,hosR_name,hosR_time
mapper.insert: insert into hosregister (hosR_id, hosR_idCar, hosR_medical, hosR_regPrice, hosR_phone, hosR_selfPrice, hosR_sex, hosR_age, hosR_work, hosR_lookDoctor, d_id, hosR_remark, hosR_state,hosR_name,hosR_time) values (#{hosrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hosrIdcar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hosrMedical,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hosrRegprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hosrPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hosrSelfprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hosrSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hosrAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hosrWork,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hosrLookdoctor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hosrRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{hosrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{hosrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update hosregister
hosR_idCar = #{hosrIdcar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosR_medical = #{hosrMedical,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosR_regPrice = #{hosrRegprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
hosR_phone = #{hosrPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosR_selfPrice = #{hosrSelfprice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hosR_sex = #{hosrSex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hosR_age = #{hosrAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hosR_work = #{hosrWork,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosR_lookDoctor = #{hosrLookdoctor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
d_id = #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hosR_remark = #{hosrRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosR_state = #{hosrState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hosR_id = #{hosrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hosR_name = #{hosrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hosR_time = #{hosrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where hosR_id = #{hosrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hosregister set hosR_idCar = #{hosrIdcar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hosR_medical = #{hosrMedical,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hosR_regPrice = #{hosrRegprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hosR_phone = #{hosrPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hosR_selfPrice = #{hosrSelfprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hosR_sex = #{hosrSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hosR_age = #{hosrAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hosR_work = #{hosrWork,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hosR_lookDoctor = #{hosrLookdoctor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_id = #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hosR_remark = #{hosrRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hosR_state = #{hosrState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hosR_name = #{hosrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hosR_time = #{hosrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where hosR_id = #{hosrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE hosregister, doctor SET hosregister.hosR_name = #{hosrName}, hosregister.hosR_idCar = #{hosrIdcar}, hosregister.hosR_medical = #{hosrMedical}, hosregister.hosR_regPrice = #{hosrRegprice}, hosregister.hosR_phone = #{hosrPhone}, hosregister.hosR_selfPrice = #{hosrSelfprice}, hosregister.hosR_sex = #{hosrSex}, hosregister.hosR_age = #{hosrAge}, hosregister.hosR_work = #{hosrWork}, hosregister.hosR_lookDoctor = #{hosrLookdoctor}, doctor.d_keshi = #{doctor.dKeshi}, doctor.d_name = #{doctor.dName}, hosregister.hosR_remark = #{hosrRemark} WHERE hosregister.d_id = doctor.d_id AND hosR_id = #{hosrId};
